name: Haque
description: Haque is a glitch fantasy roguelike adventure about cute monsters, low-bit hauntings, and a suspiciously talkative narrator. Choose your character and battle through forests, deserts and dungeons to defeat a mysterious evil. Die often. Try again!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 150 MB available space
